DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind placebo-controlled randomized clinical trial test use tamoxifen lidocaine diminish pain discomfort perform mammography , intend include 450 patient distribute three group . Inclusion criterion : Patients present mastalgia prior indication mammography 40 year old , undergoing radiological examination university hospital Federal University Goias . The patient include wish participate study . The patient receive : - Group 1 : Five capsule contain 20mg tamoxifen plus one sachet contain gel placebo ; - Group 2 : Five capsule contain placebo one sachet contain lidocaine gel 4 % ; - Group 3 : Five capsule contain placebo plus one sachet contain gel placebo . Mammography procedure : The mammography university hospital carry use high-resolution mammograph mean compression plane approximately 800 newton . All patient undergo least four image view : one craniocaudal one mediolateral oblique plane breast . When necessary , complementary imaging use , include selective compression , magnification method . Control variables : - Patient 's age complete year time study ; - Time within menstrual cycle ; - Menopausal status ; - Use oral contraceptive ; - Use hormone replacement therapy ; - Previous history mastalgia ; - Number cup coffee drunk per day ; - Bra size ; - Weight height , body mass index ( BMI ) : weight kilogram height meter , accord information provide patient time study ; - Any previous mammographic examination . Dependent variable : The pain use measure accord linear visual analog pain scale . Discomfort record four possible category accord patient 's opinion : discomfort , uncomfortable , uncomfortable intolerable . Ethical matter : This study approve Research Ethics Committee university hospital Federal University Goias conduct accordance ruling principle Helsinki Convention .
